sentences.sContent: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.sCn: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.sContent: Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.sCn: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

sentences.sContent: ...Small signs may indicate great changes to come and therefore merit attention...
...assume that people consciously and rationally choose what and how much they eat and therefore focus on providing information and more access to healthier foods...
...making sharing assets cheaper and easier than ever—and therefore possible on a much larger scale...

exam.question: John seems a nice person. _______ , I don’t trust him.

answer.explain: 即便如此。句意： 约翰看上去是个好人， 即便如此， 我还是不信任他。 even though： 尽管， 是连词， 引导让步状语从句； though： 虽然， 尽管。

words.tran: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

trans.tranOther: as a result of something that has just been mentioned
